Workflow.Name: Admin | Add Maker to Group
Workflow.Description: This flow adds a user who created an app, flow, custom connector, or environment for the first time to your Maker group. This flow gets triggered when a new record is created in the maker table.

Description.description: This flow adds a user who created an app, flow, custom connector, or environment for the first time to your Maker group. This flow gets triggered when a new record is created in the maker table.
